headline: Will Fiserv’s (FISV) Japan Clover Launch with SMCC Reshape Its Global Payments Platform Narrative
summary: On January 21, 2026, Fiserv announced a partnership with Sumitomo Mitsui Card Company to bring its Clover payments and business management platform to millions of small businesses across Japan, with a localized launch planned for late 2026. This move extends Clover’s recent international roll-out in Brazil and Australia and aligns closely with Japan’s national push to lift cashless payments to 65% by 2030. Next, we’ll consider how this Japan-focused Clover expansion, closely tied to the...
